A valid solution for this challenge according to the creator is to patch the program so that the health increases by 10, instead of decreasing, when the â€œEnterâ€ key is pressed. Inside the main function we can find SUB dword ptr [ESP + 1c], 0xa. Inside ghidra we can right click the operation and patch it. Instead of using the â€œSUBâ€ operation we will use the â€œADDâ€ operation. We can then export the program and execute it. We will see that in our version the health value goes up.

Have a great day :) github.com/johnnnathan
